articles.title: Kim Jong Un Sends Message of Condolences to King of Cambodia
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un Sends Message of Condolences to King of Cambodia
						
 Pyongyang, October 15 (KCNA) -- Kim Jong Un, first chairman of the National Defence Commission of the DPRK, sent a condolatory message to Norodom Sihamoni, king of Cambodia, on Oct. 15.
					 The message said:
					
					 Upon hearing the sad news that Great King His Majesty Norodom Sihanouk passed away, I express profound condolences to Your Majesty, and through you, to the bereaved family and the Cambodian people.
					
					 Great King His Majesty Norodom Sihanouk was the father of the Cambodian nation who devoted all his life to defending the independence and sovereignty of Cambodia and achieving reconciliation and unity of the nation and the peace and prosperity of the country. He was also the prominent international political activist who achieved great exploits for development of the non-aligned movement and the human cause of independence.
					
					 He was the close friend of the Korean people.
					
					 President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il maintained with Great King His Majesty Norodom Sihanouk the noblest and the most profound relations of obligation unprecedented in history and these relations provided an eternal foundation for relations of friendship, solidarity and cooperation between the peoples of the DPRK and Cambodia.
					
					 Though Great King His Majesty Norodom Sihanouk passed away, the noble exploits performed by him will always remain in the hearts of the peoples of the two countries and progressive mankind.

articles.title: Kim Yong Nam Greets Spanish King
articles.content:
Kim Yong Nam Greets Spanish King 
 Pyongyang, October 15 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the DPRK Supreme People's Assembly, sent a message of greeting to Juan Carlos I, Spanish king, on Oct. 12 on the occasion of its national day.
					 Kim in the message congratulated the king and people of Spain on the day, wishing the country prosperity.

articles.title: Italian Delegation Arrives
articles.content:
Italian Delegation Arrives
						
 Pyongyang, October 15 (KCNA) -- The delegation of the Democratic Party of Italy headed by International Secretary Lapo Pistelli arrived here by air on Monday.

articles.title: Japanese Delegation Visits Taedonggang Combined Fruit Farm
articles.content:
Japanese Delegation Visits Taedonggang Combined Fruit Farm 
						
 Pyongyang, October 15 (KCNA) -- The delegation of the Gunma Prefectural Council for Japan-Korea Friendship and Solidarity led by Co-representative Tsunoda Giichi visited the Taedonggang Combined Fruit Farm on Monday.
					 The guests looked round several places of the Combined Fruit Farm and the Combined Fruit Processing Factory, being briefed on the fact that the farm was built as a large-scale fruit production base under the energetic leadership of Kim Jong Il.
					
					 The delegation also visited the Pyongyang Vegetable Science Institute and the Pyongyang Floriculture Institute.

articles.title: Autumn Sowing of Wheat and Barley Seeds Over
articles.content:
Autumn Sowing of Wheat and Barley Seeds Over
						
 Pyongyang, October 15 (KCNA) -- Autumn sowing of wheat and barley seeds has been wound up in the right season in the DPRK.
					 Farms in South Hwanghae and South Phyongan provinces completed the farm work in a short span of time, fully meeting scientific and technological requirements.
					
					 Farms in North Phyongan Province successfully wound up the work in a matter of one week.
					
					 Farms on the outskirts of Pyongyang City finished the sowing of wheat and barley by raising the utility rate of sowing machines, soil covering machines, etc. after securing high-yielding seeds.
					
					 Those in North Hwanghae Province, South Hamgyong Province and Nampho City concluded the sowing in the right season through a collective innovation movement.
					
					 Officials and workers in the field of agriculture direct all efforts to the immediate harvesting in the wake of the successful completion of wheat and barley sowing and conduct farm work with sincerity.

articles.title: Week of DPRK-China Friendship Goes On in Dandong, China
articles.content:
Week of DPRK-China Friendship Goes On in Dandong, China
						
 Pyongyang, October 15 (KCNA) -- The week of the DPRK-China friendship is going on with splendor in Dandong City, China after its start on Oct. 12.
					 The week includes trade fair, fine arts and handicraft exhibition and tourism show held at a stadium, an art museum and a square in the city.
					
					 The venues have been visited by many people.
					
					 Displayed there were CNC machine tools, foodstuffs, daily necessities, medical and other goods produced in the DPRK. Fine art pieces that show beautiful mountains and streams and time-honored history and brilliant culture of Korea were also on display.
					
					 The visitors were impressed by the successes made by the Korean people in their drive to build a thriving socialist country.
					
					 Officials and people of different social strata in Liaoning Province and Dandong City, China expressed their willingness to boost cooperation and exchange with the DPRK in several fields.

articles.title: Global Handwashing Day Observed in Pyongyang
articles.content:
Global Handwashing Day Observed in Pyongyang
						
 Pyongyang, October 15 (KCNA) -- An event took place at the Grand People's Study House here on Monday to mark the Global Handwashing Day.
					 Attending it were officials of the Education Commission and other institutions concerned, kindergarten children and teachers, schoolchildren and teachers at primary and secondary schools and members of the Pyongyang missions of the UNICEF and the European Union Programme Support.
					
					 Speeches were made at the event by Song Yong Su, a department director of the Ministry of Urban Management, and Desiree Jongsma, representative of the UNICEF office in Pyongyang.
					
					 Noting that millions of children worldwide suffer from diarrhea and pneumonia each year, the speakers underscored the need to make handwashing with soap a part of daily life at kindergartens, schools and families.
					
					 A lecture on the subject of "On the Global Handwashing Day" was given at the event, followed by experience-sharing discussions and handwashing activities among preschoolers and schoolchildren.
					
					 The participants watched a Korean children film calling for observing rules of health and then went round photos introducing the correct way of handwashing with soap.
					
					 Ri Jong Chol, a section chief of the Grand People's Study House, told KCNA:
					
					 "The Global Handwashing Day has been observed in the country since 2008. 
					
					 The DPRK government pays deep attention to making its people strictly observe the rules of health, including handwashing.
					
					 It is also working hard to supply enough, clear water to people and provide them with good living conditions."

articles.title: Performance of Mansudae Art Troupe Highly Acclaimed by Chinese
articles.content:
Performance of Mansudae Art Troupe Highly Acclaimed by Chinese 
						
 Pyongyang, October 15 (KCNA) -- The Mansudae Art Troupe of the DPRK gave a performance in Dandong City, China as part of the events of the DPRK-China friendship week.
					 The venue of the performance was crowded by people.
					
					 The performance was highly acclaimed by the audience for its high ideological value and artistry and immaculate presentation.
					
					 The mayor of the Dandong City People's Government said that the performance was fantastic.
					
					 The Chinese people have deep memories of the arts of the DPRK in the 1970s and the 1980s, the mayor said, and continued:
					
					 Still fresh in our memory are the performances of "The Flower Girl" and "Sea of Blood", revolutionary operas.
					
					 "Liang Shanbo and Zhu Yingtai" and "A Dream of Red Mansions", operas created under the guidance of General Secretary Kim Jong Il, were highly acclaimed by the Chinese audience.
					
					 I would like to invite famous art troupes to China in the future.
					
					 The director of the Cultural Department of Dandong City said:
					
					 "It was first time for me to see such a perfect performance. It is so elegant and fantastic and the talent of performers is so high. The Mansudae Art Troupe is a renowned arts organization. I saw the performance of the highest level."
					
					 A citizen of Dandong City said that the performance left deep impression on Dandong citizens, adding that he saw the world-level performance.
					
					 Another citizen said that dance "Victory of Revolution Is in Sight" was so impressive, adding:
					
					 I could not repress hatred for the Japanese imperialists.
					
					 The peoples of the two countries which won victory in an anti-Japanese joint struggle will continue to fight against the imperialists, shoulder to shoulder in the future, too.
					
					 The DPRK-China friendship forged with blood will be everlasting just like the flow of the Amnok River.
					
					 A music teacher of the Koreans' Cultural and Arts Hall in Dandong said that the performance was so peculiar. Not only those in Dandong but from Shenyang and other areas came to see the performance. It raised the national pride of the Koreans in China, he added.

articles.title: Embroidery Creative Group at Mansudae Art Studio
articles.content:
Embroidery Creative Group at Mansudae Art Studio
						
 Pyongyang, October 15 (KCNA) -- There is an embroidery creative group staffed with women at the Mansudae Art Studio.
					 A merited artist Kim Mi Ran, head of the group, told KCNA:
					
					 The group creates varieties of embroideries.
					
					 The group, with a history of 30 odd years, has played a big role in the development of the nation's embroidery by employing unique embroidery techniques.
					
					 Typical of its products are embroideries "Wild Goose at Moonlit Night", "In Moonlit Evening", "Carp", "Tiger" and "Camellia", a double embroidery "Eight Fairies in Mt. Kumgang" and a large-sized embroidery "Sea of Flowers Representing Best Wishes", which are noted for their delicacy and liveliness. In particular, big embroidery "Mt. Chilbo in Autumn" is considered a masterpiece.
					
					 Many embroidery works created by the group won high appreciation at various exhibitions held at home and abroad, and not a few of them were registered as national treasures.
					
					 Many creators of the group were awarded the titles of People's Artist and Merited Artist and high state citations.

articles.title: DPRK's Housewife Proves Successful at World Veteran Taekwon-Do Championship
articles.content:
DPRK's Housewife Proves Successful at World Veteran Taekwon-Do Championship
 Pyongyang, October 15 (KCNA) -- Ri Sun Ok, a housewife aged 52, is one of top players of the Democratic People's Republic of Korea at the 5th World Veteran Taekwon-Do Championship held some time ago.
					 She garnered two gold medals in pattern first degree and 60kg-catagary sparring match and was awarded a technical prize at the championship.
					
					 Ri is not a career Taekwon-Do player. She was a basketball player at the Amnokgang Sports Team in her girlhood.
					
					 After marriage, she learnt how to play Taekwon-Do from her husband, who is a Taekwon-Do expert.
					
					 She told KCNA: "It was difficult for me, as a mother of two children, to practice Taekwon-Do. But, I never stopped training even a day, encouraged by my husband and children's backing and support."
					
					 As a Taekwon-Do instructor at the Schoolchildren's Hall in Sinuiju City, North Phyongan Province, she is now devoting herself to training juvenile Taekwon-Do players.

articles.title: Capital City of DPRK Takes on New Look
articles.content:
Capital City of DPRK Takes on New Look
						
 Pyongyang, October 15 (KCNA) -- Parks in Pyongyang are being face-lifted to suit modern aesthetic sense, providing citizens with better conditions for cultural and emotional life.
					 Kim Song Dok, vice-chairman of the Pyongyang City People's Committee, told KCNA:
					
					 Roller-skating court, mini golf course and other playing grounds have appeared and various kinds of physical exercise apparatuses installed in tens of parks in the city.
					
					 Efforts are also made to renovate public service establishments in those parks while stepping up the pavement of parkways and the greening of their vicinities.
					
					 Designers have already worked out park blueprints in a peculiar way, and citizens are turning out in the drive to renew the parks with a high degree of patriotism.
					
					 Samma Park in Tongdaewon District with an area of more than 18 000 square meters and Sanghung Children's Park in Sosong District are to be equipped with courts for roller-skating, mini golf and badminton, basketball and volleyball.
					
					 There are more than ten kinds of amusement facilities, folk-game sites and dancing grounds in those parks. 
					
					 Chongryu Scientists' Park is also taking on a new look, with a pavilion built in the centre and sports and amusement facilities on either side of the pavilion.

articles.title: Turf Planting Gets into Full Swing in DPRK
articles.content:
Turf Planting Gets into Full Swing in DPRK
						
 Pyongyang, October 15 (KCNA) -- Turf planting gets into full swing in streets, villages, parks and pleasure grounds throughout the Democratic People's Republic of Korea under the deep care of respected Marshal Kim Jong Un.
					 Kim Jong Un, who defined the idea of valuing even a blade of grass and a tree in the country as Kim Jong Il's patriotism, made up his mind to turn the whole of the country into green foliage. He gave instructions concerning turf planting on many occasions, taking a measure to establish a lawn research institute at the State Academy of Sciences.
					
					 The institute plans to cover vacant lots in cities with a new species of turf in the near future.
					
					 It has already succeeded in developing the technology of soilless turf cultivation, paving a way for creating lawn lands on a massive basis.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Slams U.S. Aim to Build Missile Shield in East Asia
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Slams U.S. Aim to Build Missile Shield in East Asia 
						
 Pyongyang, October 15 (KCNA) -- The U.S. moves to build a missile shield are a product of its reactionary strategy to dominate the world, says Rodong Sinmun Monday in a bylined article.
					 Panetta, U.S. secretary of Defense, when meeting the Japanese minister of Defense in Tokyo recently, agreed to set up another radar base in the southern area of Japan allegedly for coping with "threat of north Korea's missile attack."
					
					 Earlier, the U.S. announced its plan to set up new radar bases in Japan and Southeast Asia and link them with missile interceptor systems deployed in land and waters in a bid to build a missile shied in East Asia.
					
					 In fact, missile threat is posed not to the U.S. but to the DPRK and other countries in Asia, the article notes, laying bare the aim of the U.S. to set up the radar base in Japan. It goes on:
					
					 The U.S. is the world's biggest possessor of attack missiles. This being a hard reality, the U.S. is getting crazy in the moves to build the missile shield, talking about "its defense" from "missile threat" from the DPRK. Lurking behind this is a sinister aim of the U.S. It seeks to make "missile threat" from the DPRK an established fact in an effort to dominate East Asia by force of arms.
					
					 The U.S. frantic moves to build missile shields are straining the situation in the region and sparking off an arms race.
					
					  News analysts comment at present that the U.S. projected building of missile shields in Asia is aimed, in actuality, to contain China and Russia.
					
					 The U.S. is the arch criminal wrecking the world peace, security and stability and sparking a new arms race and missile race.

articles.title: S. Korean Authorities' Row over "North Wind" Slammed
articles.content:
S. Korean Authorities' Row over "North Wind" Slammed
						
 Pyongyang, October 15 (KCNA) -- The Media Headquarters of the South Side Committee for Implementing June 15 Joint Declaration released a statement on Oct. 12 denouncing the south Korean puppet regime for kicking up a noisy row over "the north wind".
					 The statement accused the conservative forces of becoming evermore vociferous about the row over "the north wind" with the "presidential" election at hand.
					
					 It drew attention to the fact that the Ministry of Defense worked out a "standard teaching plan" branding the "forces following the north" as "the enemy of the 'ROK' army" and distributed it to all units as educational guidelines.
					
					 The military authorities labeled the "forces following the north" as the "enemy-benefiting forces blindly following the north's strategic line toward the south and the enemy of the army," the statement noted, adding that nine social bodies including the Pan-national Alliance of Youth and Students for Korea's Reunification and the Overseas Headquarters of the Pan-national Alliance for Korea's Reunification were added to the list of enemy-benefiting organizations.
					
					 The statement held it is nonsensical to suppress such organizations for being "enemy-benefiting organizations," claiming that their call for forcing the U.S. forces to quit south Korea, repealing the "Security Law" and achieving reunification by federal formula was tantamount to blindly following the north's line.
					
					 It chided the conservative media for releasing misinformation after joining such campaign.
					
					 It urged the conservative group to immediately stop the above-said row aimed to stay in power.

articles.title: Lee Myung Bak Group Accused of Scattering Anti-DPRK Leaflets
articles.content:
Lee Myung Bak Group Accused of Scattering Anti-DPRK Leaflets
						
 Pyongyang, October 15 (KCNA) -- The Solidarity for Democracy, People's Life, Peaceful Reunification and Sovereignty of south Korea in a statement on October 10 denounced the group of traitors for becoming crazy in its moves to scatter anti-DPRK leaflets.
					 The statement hammered the Lee Myung Bak "government" on its plan to hurl conservative organizations into the operations to scatter anti-north leaflets in the area along the Military Demarcation Line in October in the wake of its operations in September.
					
					 The statement branded this move as an act of escalating the military tension between the south and the north of Korea and pushing the situation to an extreme phase.
					
					 The present "government" mobilized not only conservative organizations but military forces for the operations to scatter leaflets in violation of the agreement between the south and the north on stopping slandering each other, the statement noted, adding this is aimed to destabilize the north.
					
					 The statement urged the "government" to stop at an early date the reckless act of increasing the danger of a war.

articles.title: Japanese Government Urged to Take Measures to Settle Sexual Slavery Issue
articles.content:
Japanese Government Urged to Take Measures to Settle Sexual Slavery Issue
						
 Pyongyang, October 15 (KCNA) -- Members of an academic research organization and civic organization of south Korea held a press conference in Seoul on Oct. 12 at which they demanded the Japanese government take legal and administrative measures to settle the issue related to sexual slavery.
					 Women who were taken away as sexual slaves for the Imperial Japanese Army in the past are typical victims of the Japanese imperialist colonial domination and rule, they said, referring to the fact that they are still suffering from pain.
					
					 To settle the issue related to sexual slavery will mark an occasion of showing the will of Japan to liquidate the past crimes, they said.
					
					 Japan should bear due responsibility for its crimes related to sexual slavery, institute law for making an official apology and reparation to the victims and implement it at an early date, they urged.

articles.title: S. Korean Authorities' Crackdown upon Forces for Reunification Movement Slammed
articles.content:
S. Korean Authorities' Crackdown upon Forces for Reunification Movement Slammed
						
 Pyongyang, October 15 (KCNA) -- The European Regional Headquarters of the Pan-national Alliance for Korea's Reunification (Pomminryon) issued a statement on October 11 denouncing the south Korean puppet conservative group for its crackdown upon the forces for the reunification movement. 
					 The statement referred to the fact that the Supreme Court dismissed the final appeal made by Chairman Ri Kyu Jae, former Secretary General Ri Kyong Won and former Chairperson in charge of information service Choe Un A of the South Headquarters of Pomminryon, on the same day and chided this action on behalf of all the compatriots.
					
					 The statement went on:
					
					 The Supreme Court upheld the judgment of guilty already passed on them by invoking the "Security Law". This is a reckless action against the nation and reunification.
					
					 A particular mention should be made of the fact that the daughter of the "yusin" dictator is running for "the presidential" election and justifying the May 16 military coup and fascist dictatorship. This is a grave act of treachery, indeed.
					
					 Keeping pace with her campaign, the Ministry of Defense issued such educational guidelines as "forces following the north are the enemy of the 'ROK' army" to its units. Conservative media including Chosun Ilbo, Choongang Ilbo and Dong-A Ilbo and government-controlled broadcasting services are kicking up "a racket against the forces following the north" by releasing misinformation.
					
					 The statement called for judging the treacherous and anti-reunification sycophantic forces and getting the SL repealed without fail.

articles.title: U.S., S. Korean Warmongers' Racket for War of Aggression against DPRK Lambasted
articles.content:
U.S., S. Korean Warmongers' Racket for War against DPRK Lambasted
						
 Pyongyang, October 15 (KCNA) -- The General Association of Koreans in China issued a statement on October 11 in support of the statement issued by a spokesman for the DPRK National Defence Commission.
					 The south Korean authorities announced a new "missile guidance agreement" on Oct. 7 after repeatedly having confabs for revising "missile guidelines" with the U.S., their master, for a long period, the statement recalled, adding:
					
					 The U.S. and the south Korean puppet regime share interests in rounding off the preparations for a preemptive attack on the north under the pretext of coping with its "threat".
					
					 The south Korean regime is seeking to secure the capacity to strike all areas of the DPRK with missiles. Proceeding from this, it realized its design to extend the firing range of ballistic missiles and joined the U.S. missile shield through the recent negotiations in a bid to ignite a war against the north at any cost.
					
					 It was the sinister scenario of the U.S. to allow the south Korean forces to extend the firing range of ballistic missiles in an effort to bolster the capacity for attacking the north and thus use them as a shock brigade for a war against the north and, at the same time, plug south Korea into its moves for building missile shields in the Asia-Pacific region and establish its unchallenged position there. 
					
					 The U.S. and the south Korean regime, however, are seriously mistaken.
					
					 Their reckless racket for a war against the DPRK is little short of an act of digging out their own graves.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un's Work Given Publicity in Ecuador
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un's Work Given Publicity in Ecuador
						
 Pyongyang, October 15 (KCNA) -- The dear respected Kim Jong Un's work "Let Us Hold Great Comrade Kim Jong Il in High Esteem as General Secretary of Our Party Forever and Successfully Accomplish the Revolutionary Cause of Juche" was posted on the Internet website by the Kim Jong Il Library in Ecuador on Oct. 7. 
					 The work, published on April 6, 2012, clarifies that it is the principled requirement for the victorious advance of the Korean revolution to hold leader Kim Jong Il in high esteem as eternal general secretary of the Workers' Party of Korea.
					
					 It indicates the tasks to be fulfilled to steadily develop the WPK into a glorious party of President Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un Praised in UK
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un Praised in UK
 Pyongyang, October 15 (KCNA) -- The British Association for the Study of Songun Policy posted on its Internet homepage on Oct. 2 an article praising the dear respected Kim Jong Un illustrated with photos of him inspecting a unit of the Korean People's Army and visiting a family that moved into a newly built apartment house in Changjon Street.
					 The article titled "The dear respected Comrade Kim Jong Un is the leader of the times" said:
					
					 Marshal Kim Jong Un, first secretary of the Workers' Party of Korea, first chairman of the National Defence Commission of the DPRK and supreme commander of the Korean People's Army, is a prominent leader admired by the world.
					
					 Kim Jong Un has wisely led the struggle to build a thriving socialist nation in the DPRK, reunify the divided country and realize the global independence under the banner of Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism.
					
					 He has carried forward and developed the ideas and theories of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il. He has wisely led the DPRK to advance along the road of independence, Songun and socialism.
					
					 The supreme commander possessed of strong pluck and grit visited service personnel of the Korean People's Army in the biggest hotspot on a forefront braving danger, sending shivers down the spines of the enemies.
					
					 He has always directed deep attention not only to the defence upbuilding but to the improvement of the people's living standard.
					
					 He is the popular leader who always mixes with people.

articles.title: WPK Praised in Brazil, Peru
articles.content:
WPK Praised in Brazil, Peru
 Pyongyang, October 15 (KCNA) --Organizations of Brazil and Peru posted special write-ups on Internet homepages on Oct. 4 and 5 on the occasions of the 15th anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il's election as general secretary of the Workers' Party of Korea and the 67th birthday of the WPK.
					 The Brazilian Center for the Study of the Juche Idea posted an article titled "The 15th anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il's election as general secretary of the Workers' Party of Korea" illustrated with photos introducing Songun Korea.
					
					 Elected general secretary of the WPK at the end of the last century when the DPRK underwent the worst trial, Kim Jong Il increased the country's political, ideological and military might in every way, holding higher the banner of Songun, the article said, and went on:
					
					 The 4th Conference of the WPK made a decision to hold Kim Jong Il in high esteem as eternal general secretary of the WPK as he protected the dignity and sovereignty of socialist Korea and developed the WPK into an invincible revolutionary party with his Songun leadership.
					
					 The new monumental edifices that have sprung up in Pyongyang to suit the appearance of the prospering DPRK are the fruition of the patriotic devotion Kim Jong Il made by working heart and soul for the country's prosperity and that of Kim Jong Un who carries forward his intention.
					
					 The WPK will put into practice the idea and cause of Kim Jong Il under the leadership of Kim Jong Un.
					
					 The Peruvian-Korean Institute of Culture and Friendship edited an article dealing with the undying exploits performed by Kim Jong Il for party building and immortal Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism.

articles.title: Important Days of DPRK Observed in Different Countries
articles.content:
Important Days of DPRK Observed in Different Countries
						
 Pyongyang, October 15 (KCNA) -- Events took place in different countries on the occasions of the 15th anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il's election as general secretary of the Workers' Party of Korea and the 67th anniversary of the WPK.
					 Book and photo exhibitions were held at the Kim Il Sung Institute of Agricultural Science in Guinea and the Ugandan National Women's Council, an opening ceremony of photo show week at the Nigeria-Korea Stereo Industrial Company and a book exhibition at an Indonesian company between Oct. 1 and 4.
					
					 Displayed in the venues of the exhibition were photos showing exploits performed by President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il for party building and the revolutionary activities of the dear respected Kim Jong Un.
					
					 Also on display there were works of Kim Jong Il and books and photos introducing Songun Korea.
					
					 The director general of the Kim Il Sung Institute of Agricultural Science in Guinea said:
					
					 The WPK founded by Kim Il Sung has developed into an experienced and tested party which has always led the people to victory only despite any storm and trial and an invincible party absolutely supported and trusted by the people.
					
					 The WPK will always emerge victorious as it is led by Kim Jong Un.
					
					 The acting executive secretary of the Ugandan National Women's Council said:
					
					 The Korean people have achieved shining successes, single-mindedly united around their supreme leader Kim Jong Un.
					
					 These are associated with the immortal exploits performed by Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il.
					
					 The managing director of the Nigeria-Korea Stereo Industrial Company noted that the WPK demonstrated its might as the most powerful party in the world entirely because it was under the leadership of Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il. 
					
					 Speakers including the manager of the Indonesian company said that after witnessing the close unity of all the Korean people around their leader while staying in the DPRK, they keenly realized that no force on earth could break the single-minded unity of the DPRK.

articles.title: Anniversary of WPK Marked Abroad
articles.content:
Anniversary of WPK Marked Abroad
 Pyongyang, October 15 (KCNA) -- Meetings and book and photo exhibitions took place in Democratic Congo, Sweden and Finland on October 4 and 5 to mark the 67th anniversary of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK).
					 Displayed in the venues of the events were photos showing immortal exploits performed by President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il for part-building and the revolutionary activities of the dear respected Kim Jong Un.
					
					 On display there were works of the peerlessly great men of Mt. Paektu and books and photos introducing the effort of the Korean people in building a thriving nation.
					
					 Attending the events were officials of the People's Party for the Reconstruction and the Democracy, the Communist Party, the Workers' Party, the People's Rally for Socialism and the Working Citizens' Association of Democratic Congo, the Group for the Study of the Juche Idea of University of Kinshasa, the Democratic Congo-Korea Friendship and Solidarity Association, the Sweden-Korea Friendship Association, the Communist Party in Sweden, the Swedish Group for the Study of the Juche Idea, the Finnish Communists' League, the Finnish National Committee for the Study of the Juche Idea, and the Finland-Korea Society and masses.
					
					 Otete Gaston Mboyo, deputy general secretary of the Central Committee of the Communist Party of Democratic Congo, said the history of the Workers' Party of Korea is the revolutionary history of Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il both in name and reality.
					
					 The WPK and the Korean people will surely win a final victory as they are led by Marshal Kim Jong Un, he stressed.
					
					 Christer Lundgren, chairman of the Sweden-Korea Friendship Association, referred to the course of victory and glory covered by the WPK.
					
					 Juha Kieksy, chairman of the Finnish National Committee for the Study of the Juche Idea, hoped that the WPK and the Korean people would always register successes in the accomplishment of the socialist cause under the wise leadership of Kim Jong Un.
					
					 Messages of greeting to Kim Jong Un were adopted at the meetings held in Democratic Congo and Sweden.

articles.title: WPK's Birthday Observed in Indonesia, Syria
articles.content:
WPK's Birthday Observed in Indonesia, Syria 
						
 Pyongyang, October 15 (KCNA) -- Indonesian and Syrian personages released statements on Oct. 7 and 9 on the occasion of the 67th anniversary of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK). 
					 Ristiyanto, general secretary of the National Guidance Council of the Pioneer Party of Indonesia, said that the WPK founded by President Kim Il Sung, great leader of the Korean people, is a Juche-oriented revolutionary party enjoying absolute support and trust from all people. 
					
					 The cause of Juche revolution is now being successfully carried forward by Kim Jong Un, first secretary of the WPK, he noted, expressing hope that the Korean people would achieve great successes in building a thriving nation under his leadership.
					
					 Saber Ballul, department head of the Political Faculty of University of Damascus of Syria, said the WPK has achieved successes in socialist construction as it is guided by the Juche idea. 
					
					 Leader Kim Jong Il successfully carried forward the precious revolutionary legacy of President Kim Il Sung, he said, and went on:
					
					 Kim Jong Un is steadfastly carrying forward the idea and cause of Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il. 
					
					 The WPK led by Kim Jong Un will always steer the Korean people to victory.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un se fotografia con participantes en acto conmemorativo
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un se fotografia con participantes en acto conmemorativo
						
Pyongyang, 15 de octubre (ACNC) -- El Mariscal Kim Jong Un, Primer Secretario del Partido del Trabajo de Corea, Primer Presidente del Comite de Defensa Nacional de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea y Comandante Supremo del Ejercito Popular de Corea, se retrato junto con los participantes en el acto conmemorativo del 65o aniversario de la fundacion de la Escuela Revolucionaria de Mangyongdae y la Escuela Revolucionaria Kang Pan Sok.
					El felicito calurosamente a los profesores, empleados, alumnos y graduados de esas escuelas por la citada efemeride.
					
					Evaluo altamente los meritos realizados por las escuelas en los 65 anos pasados bajo la guia y atencion de los Grandes Hombres del monte Paektu, tales como haber formado a muchos pilares que juegan el papel medular y central en la lucha por la defensa de la patria y la prosperidad del pais.
					
					Estimulo cordialmente a los graduados diciendo que ellos crecieron respirando el aire y tomando el agua de Mangyongdae y asimilando el espiritu del mismo lugar y cumplen ahora plenamente con su mision y deber como pilares de la revolucion del Songun e hijos del partido.
					
					Tomo la foto de recuerdo con los participantes expresando la esperanza y conviccion de que ellos desempenaran siempre el papel nuclear en la lucha por llevar a feliz termino de generacion en generacion la causa revolucionaria del Juche iniciada en el monte Paektu.
					
					El Mariscal respondio cordialmente a las aclamaciones de los participantes.
					
					Le acompanaron en esta ocasion Choe Yong Rim, Choe Ryong Hae, Kim Kyong Hui, Jang Song Thaek, Kim Yong Chun, Hyon Chol Hae, O Kuk Ryol, Thae Jong Su, Ri Pyong Sam y otros cuadros del partido, el Estado y el ejercito graduados de las escuelas revolucionarias, O Ryong Thaek, director de la Escuela Revolucionaria de Mangyongdae, y Ju Sun Ok, directora de la Escuela Revolucionaria        Kang Pan Sok.
					
					Tambien participaron Ri Ul Sol, Hwang Sun Hui, Kim Chol Man y otros combatientes veteranos antijaponeses

articles.title: Se reconstruyen parques de Pyongyang
articles.content:
Se reconstruyen parques de Pyongyang
Pyongyang, 15 de octubre (ACNC) -- Los parques de esta capital se han reconstruido conforme al sentimiento estetico de la actualidad, los cuales se ofreceran a los capitalinos las mas magnificas condiciones  de vida cultural.
					Citado por la ACNC, Kim Song Dok (55 anos de edad), vicepresidente del Comite Popular de la ciudad de Pyongyang, dijo:
					
					Actualmente, se construyen nuevamente en decenas de parques de esta capital los campos deportivos como la cancha de patin de ruedas y la de mini-golf y se instalan los implementos deportivos.
					
					Se renuevan los establecimientos de servicio de los parques, la formacion de acera y de arboleda.
					
					A base de los disenos del parque, el comite aviva el fervor patriotico de los trabajadores para que se movilicen activamente en esta labor.
					
					Se acondicionan nuevamente las canchas de patin de ruedas, badminton, mini-golf, baloncesto y voleibol en el parque de Samma del municipio de Tongdaewon, cuya superficie es mas de 18 mil metros cuadros y en el parque infantil de Sanghung del municipio de Sosong.
					
					Se apareceran el parque infantil con mas de 10 equipos atractivos, el campo de juego folclorico y el campo de baile.
					
					El parque de cientificos de Chongryu se acondiciona para que los cientificos y los habitantes pasen un momento dichoso de descanso haciendo deportes.
					
					Se construyen en el centro de parque un pabellon, la pasadera en su alrededor y la zona de recreo deportivo en ambos lados de ese pabellon.
					
					Se instalaran campos de flores y areas verdes en los parques.
					
					Gracias a los abnegados esfuerzos de los capitalinos, se levantaran mas hermosamente como lugares de descanso cultural los parques de esta capital.

articles.title: Maestras en bordado de la Casa de Creacion Mansudae
articles.content:
Maestras en bordado de la Casa de Creacion Mansudae
						
Pyongyang, 15 de octubre (ACNC) -- La Casa de Creacion Mansudae tiene un colectivo de bordadoras calificadas.
					Citada por la ACNC, la artista benemerita Kim Mi Ran (48 anos de edad), jefa del citado colectivo, dijo que su colectivo, compuesto por varias salas de creacion, hace los bordados de diferentes tipos como los de pinturas, y prosiguio:
					
					Cualquier cosa se convierte en bordado fino en manos de mis companeras que contribuyen mucho al desarrollo de la bordadura coreana.
					
					Nuestro colectivo labora ya por mas de 30 anos.
					
					Los bordados representativos son "Gansos silvestres en la noche de luna", "En la noche de luna", "Carpa", "Tigre", "Flor de camelia", el bordado de dos caras "Ocho hadas del monte Kumgang", el bordado de gran dimension "Flores de votos", etc.
					
					Particularmente, se puede decir que es obra de talla mundial la bordadura de gran tamano "Monte Chilbo cubierto de hojas enrojecidas".
					
					Los bordados hechos por mis companeras obtuvieron excelentes apreciaciones en las exposiciones nacionales como la Exposicion Nacional de Bellas Artes y las otras internacionales.
					
					No pocas obras fueron registradas como patrimonios nacionales.
					
					En reconocimiento de esos meritos, el Estado concedio a ellas los titulos honorificos como artistas del Pueblo y benemeritas y otras condecoraciones estatales.
					
					Ellas trabajan ahora con mas pasion e inteligencia para mejorar la calidad de sus obras y demostrar asi al mundo la excelente cultura de la nacion coreana.

articles.title: Taekwondoca cincuentona Ri Sun Ok
articles.content:
Taekwondoca cincuentona Ri Sun Ok
Pyongyang, 15 de octubre (ACNC) -- Entre los jugadores coreanos, que brillaron en el V Campeonato Mundial de Veteranos de Taekwondo, se destaca Ri Sun Ok que tiene 52 anos de edad.
					En esa cita deportiva, ella conquisto 2 medallas de oro y el premio tecnico al ocupar el primer lugar en el pattern veterano del primero nivel para la clase de oro y en el parrins de la division de 60kg.
					
					En su juventud, era jugadora de baloncesto del Conjunto Deportivo Amnokgang. 
					
					Aprendio Taekwondo despues de casarse con su esposo taekwondoca. 
					
					Le fue muy dificil aprender los movimientos tecnicos de Taekwondo siendo madre de dos hijos. 
					
					Citada por la ACNC, Ri recordo aquellos dias de aprendiz: 
					
					Aunque fui deportista en mi juventud, me fue muy dificil practicar ese arte marcial criando a mis hijos.
					
					A veces, me arrepenti de haberlo comenzado. 
					
					Pude superar los momentos agotados, estimulada por el apoyo y exigencia de mi esposo y por el estimulo de mis hijos. 
					
					No he dejado de entrenar ni un dia. 
					
					Gracias a tales esfuerzos, se ha elevado poco a poco el nivel tecnico y fisico de Ri Sun Ok, adorada como "jugadora madre". 
					
					Ella trabaja ahora como entrenadora de Taekwondo en la Casa de Ninos Escolares de la ciudad de Sinuiju de la provincia de Phyong-an del Norte dedicando toda su pasion e inteligencia para formar a todos sus discipulos como excelentes taekwondocas.
